name: On The Wire
description:
Hello, New Hire!

Play as a switchboard operator for a somewhat-rundown call company. Connect calls by looking people up on your handy-dandy phone book and plugging them in. Be quick, as you don't want to make your boss upset!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with the theme: Joined Together

We hope you enjoy! Don’t forget to rate our game!

Made by:
The One Who Got Everyone In This Mess - Thomas (https://mryellow.itch.io/)

The One Who Came Up With The Idea - Evan (https://mitty-green.itch.io/)

The One Who Did All Of The Art - Preston (https://pajamaham.itch.io/)

The One Who Made A Lot Of Racket - Daniel (https://dandey-mond.itch.io/)

The One Who Did Most Of The Work - Maurice (https://fenteale.itch.io/)
